Today at Knowledge, our CEO Bill McDermott shared a big, bold vision for ServiceNow. Transformative Collaboration at EY wavespace Munich: Unleashing the Potential of GenAI in HR A day in our EY wavespace Munich marked by a surge of inspiration and collaborative energy, where we explored the vast possibilities of General AI (GenAI) in revolutionizing Human Resources. I'm deeply grateful for the rich exchange of perspectives with our diverse group of participants, hailing from various industries, all united in their quest for innovation. The discussions underscored the importance of user-centric approaches, swift innovation, and agile practices in today's fast-paced business landscape. A heartfelt thank you to Martin, Benjamin and S√∂ren for igniting our imaginations with practical insights into GenAI applications. Their presentation on use-cases, bolstered by real-life examples, provided a tangible vision of what's possible when technology meets human ingenuity. I also want to extend my appreciation to Barbara, Max and Tobias for their invaluable contributions. Their shared experiences and wisdom shed light on the transformative journey of integrating GenAI into HR processes. The collective innovative spirit in the room was truly invigorating. It's clear that when we come together in spaces designed to foster creativity and co-creation, like EY wavespace, there's no limit to what we can achieve. As we continue to navigate the exciting realm of GenAI, I look forward to further collaborations that push the boundaries of what we can accomplish in HR and beyond. Reaching the base camp is an achievement, but navigating the path from base camp to the peak requires a different set of skills. This journey demands continual learning, relearning, adapting, and maintaining a strong presence. To truly be felt and heard - what we call - Executive Presence - is essential. And this goes beyond mere confidence and encompassing Gravitas: The way you act, carrying yourself with authority and poise. Authenticity: Projecting your true self through effective and genuine communication Appearance: Dressing in a manner that reflects professionalism and respect. The LEAP (Leadership Empowerment for Accelerated Progress) program at ServiceNow exemplified its intent to (re) create future leaders. The meticulous planning and dedication of the delivery team, led by Kamla Mulla, Sai Prasad, Sulekha Kapadan ensured seamless facilitation. For me, the participants' curiosity and eagerness to learn were truly invigorating and kept me on my toes. Thank You so Much team Service Now..ilango AP (he/him/his),Rajendra Palorkar,Varun Jayanti. # LEAP #Service Now#Leadership

Today, as I celebrate another year around the sun, I find myself reflecting on the exciting collaboration journey we've embarked on with our Alliance Partner ServiceNow. Earlier today, we came together for an #EYwavespace Experience and began to co-create a future multi-client wavespace event aimed to help our clients uncover how they may leverage #GenAI to fuel their transformative shifts in #GBS. We discussed the value, know-how and the use cases we each bring to the table and how we may best orchestrate and package it up in a digestable and engaging format for our clients. Having Adrian Ott in this conversation took us to an entirely new level of exploration and asking the right questions when it comes to real-life GenAI application. What truly excites me is not just the destination, but the way we're approaching this; the meta level if you may. Our commitment to collaborative work isn't just reserved for THE day when we welcome the clients into our wavespace; it's rather embedded into every step we take to get there, amplifying our collective creativity and expertise.
